      • initializeMark

        public static Mark initializeMark​(Student student,
                                  Course course)
        Initializes marks for a student when he/she just registered a course.
        Parameters:
        student - the student this mark record belongs to.
        course - the course this mark record about.
        Returns:
        the new added mark.

      • setCourseWorkMark

        public static void setCourseWorkMark​(boolean isExam)
        Sets the coursework mark for the mark record.
        Parameters:
        isExam - whether this coursework component refers to "Exam"

      • computeMark

        public static double computeMark​(java.util.ArrayList<Mark> thisCourseMark,
                                 java.lang.String thisComponentName)
        Computes the sum of marks for a particular component of a particular course
        Parameters:
        thisCourseMark - the array list of mark records belong to a particular course
        thisComponentName - the component name interested.
        Returns:
        the sum of component marks

      • printCourseStatistics

        public static void printCourseStatistics()

        Returns:
